text: avarkaḷiṭam accamūṭṭi eccarippavar evarum varuvārāyiṉ niccayamākat tāṅkaḷ maṟṟenta oru camutāyattaiyum viṭa mika nērāṉapātaiyil ceṉṟu koṇṭiruppatāka avarkaḷ allāhviṉ mītu palamāṉa pirāmāṇaṅkaḷaik koṇṭu cattiyam ceytārkaḷ; āyiṉum avarkaḷiṭam accamūṭṭi eccarippavar enta pōtu, (atu) avarkaḷukku veṟuppait tavira (vēṟetaiyum) atikappaṭutta villai
